r.s: An interceptor to control the access to resources which can be accessed only by authenticated users
r.d: An interceptor to control the access to resources which can be accessed only by authenticated users
r.n:
A new release of Piece_Unity_Component_Authentication is now available.
What's New in Piece_Unity_Component_Authentication 1.1.1
* A defect fix: A defect that caused a warning "PHP Warning: call_user_func(Piece_Unity_Plugin_Interceptor_Authentication::loadAuthenticationState)" to be raised until any protected resource was requested has been fixed.
